```{r include=FALSE}

# Markdown options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = TRUE)

# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(volker)
theme_set(theme_bw())

# Recode -9 to NA
data <- prepare(volker::chatgpt)

```


# A single categorical variable

```{r}
report_counts(data, sd_gender)
```

# A cross table

```{r}
data %>% 
  filter(sd_gender != "divers") %>% 
  report_counts(adopter, sd_gender, prop="rows")
```

# Automatic index calculation
```{r}

data %>% 
  filter(sd_gender != "divers") %>% 
  report_counts(starts_with("cg_adoption_"))

```


# Group comparisons of an index
```{r}
data %>% 
  filter(sd_gender != "divers") %>% 
  report_metrics(starts_with("cg_adoption_"), sd_gender)

```

# Mixed content

### Adoption types

```{r}
data %>% 
  filter(sd_gender != "divers") %>% 
  report_counts(adopter, sd_gender, prop="rows", title=F, close=F)
```


##### Method
Basis: Only male and female respondents.
